name: Maigoni
description:
Taking place inside an abandonned japanese temple, Maigoni is a little game about haunting yourself. An Oni, cursed to wander endlessly inside this temple and collect an infinite amount of mantras, has to constantly be aware of his own reflections and ghosts. One slight contact with his own self could cause him to disappear. Will he ever be able to escape ?

How to play Credits

This game was made during the Global Game Jam of 2021.

Baptiste Bourgoin - Game Designer
Brice Cornuau - Gameplay Programmer
Théo Lemoine - Graphic Programmer
Armel Morvan - Graphist
Valentin Posadas - Level & Sound Designer, Composer
Victor Couturieux - Gameplay Programmer
Yann Imbert - Composer
